text: Michael M. Richter (June 21, 1938 - July 10, 2020) was a German mathematician and computer scientist. Richter was well known for his career in mathematical logic. His works focused in non-standard analysis, and artificial intelligence. He was a key figure in case-based reasoning. Richter was born in Berlin. Richter died on July 10, 2020 at the age of 82.NACHRUF PROF. DR. MICHAEL M. RICHTER ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:German mathematicians Category:German computer scientists Category:Scientists from Berlin
title: Michael M. Richter
